message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll really love. I'm looking to sell it to you for $150. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your willingness to make an offer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $130, Bob. I'm thinking more along the lines of $145. Can you meet me there?
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $142.50. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $140 for the product.
I'm not willing to go back to $140, Bob. I'm thinking more along the lines of $145 again. Can we meet in the middle at $142.75?
Considering our previous negotiations, I am willing to pay $142.5 for the product.
